pageProps.content:
Experience

Set within a private concession within the heart of the Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, you will find Sanctuary Gorilla Forest Camp.
Providing a perfect balance between remote beauty & classic luxury, Gorilla Forest Camp is the ideal choice for those wanting to experience this World Heritage Site in style.
It is no surprise that Bwindi is Uganda’s premier safari destination when it comes to gorilla trekking. This memorable experience will leave lasting memories as you come face to face with one of Africa’s most popular primates.

Stay

Sanctuary Mountain Gorilla Lodge is a small & intimate camp, with only 8 luxury tents made from canvas.
Each tent features a spacious en-suite bathroom with a free-standing bath – ideal for relaxing after a day’s trekking.
The central lodge area includes a spacious lounge where guests can enjoy a drink from the well-stocked bar, a dining room overlooking the rain forest & a campfire where interesting stories are shared after a day out in the forest.

Activities

Gorilla trekking is not the only activity on the list at Gorilla Mountain Lodge.
Other activities available in the area include scenic nature walks to the volcanoes, lakes & waterfalls as well as cultural visits to the Batwa people where guests can learn more about their way of life.

subfolders.title: Buhoma Lodge
subfolders.description: Buhoma Lodge is situated at the gateway to Bwindi Impenetrable Forest & is one of only 2 lodges set within the national park & an ideal choice when embarking on your bucket-list gorilla trekking expedition.  The lodge is renowned for its warm & welcoming atmosphere & little extras like a complimentary massage, a boot cleaning service & a hot water bottle in bed make guests feel extra welcome. Since Buhoma Lodge is located just steps away from the trek start point, gorillas have been spotted popping in for an occasional visit, while the resident monkeys tend to visit the gardens almost daily.

subfolders.title: Bwindi Lodge
subfolders.description: Bwindi Lodge is a luxurious eco-lodge set in the forest canopy of Uganda’s beautiful Bwindi Impenetrable National Park. This area is renowned for its life-changing gorilla trekking expeditions.  The Buhoma region of Impenetrable Forest has at least 3 habituated gorilla families that live in the thick, damp tropical undergrowth.  Tracking them is exciting & rewarding.   The area is also home to monkeys, chimpanzees & countless birds which does not make it hard to believe why this pocket of the primaeval forest is one of the most biologically diverse areas on Earth & a World Heritage Site.

subfolders.title: Chameleon Hill Lodge
subfolders.description: Chameleon Hill Lodge enjoys a spectacular location overlooking an unspoilt Rift Valley lake framed by the rugged Virunga Volcanoes.   Lying between the nearby Bwindi Forest & Mgahinga Park - Uganda’s prime gorilla trekking destinations – Chameleon Hill Lodge offers not only the chance to track mountain gorillas, but also to enjoy hiking & mountain biking as well as exhilarating boat trips & cultural interactions. The bold, vibrant design of the lodge gives a feeling of rustic charm & creates a warm family-friendly atmosphere.

subfolders.title: Clouds Mountain Gorilla Lodge
subfolders.description: Clouds Mountain Gorilla Lodge in Uganda has easy access to at least 6 gorilla families who live in the nearby Bwindi Impenetrable Park – a bucket-list activity on everyone’s list! Cloud’s goal is to support long-term protection of the gorillas & originated as a conservation project between the Nkuringo community, the African Wildlife Foundation & the Uganda Safari Company.   The views from the lodge are truly breathtaking – from the large windows guests will have uninterrupted views over the tranquil forest & Virunga volcanoes.
